website_summaries.verdict: The Pixel 2 brings exclusive Google Assistant features you can't get on any other phone, and lets you trigger them with a squeeze.
cons: Small screen and big bezels for the size

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy from amazon, if you really want the phone buy from google
customer_reviews.text: I only had the phone for 2 months and it totally stopped working. It was stuck on the bootloader screen and couldn’t recover it no matter what I did. I called amazon support, the person was no help and told me she couldn’t do anything because I couldn’t return it. The only thing she did that was helpful was call google support for me and they were helpful. I told them my problem and told me that my phone couldn’t be fixed and they asked me for the IMEI # to see if I was under warranty. Thank goodness I was now I have to send the phone to them and they should send me a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Love the size. Takes beautiful pics. 128gb of memory. Water resistant. Large bezels...but I like the everyday practicality...especially when using the phone in landscape mode. Excellent support and super fast to receive software upgrades. Battery last all day on a full charge with "moderate" use. I have small feminine hands and the phone is easy to use one handed. Fits perfectly in a back pocket. Excellent night pics with the camera. Seller (Edge Cellular) shipped the phone out quickly and even though it was rated "good" condition the phone came nearly flawless. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: njack

customer_reviews.title: Good phone, okay battery.
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Phone runs good, no scratches on the camera lenses. Came with a very sturdy charging cable and a block. Cons: The battery life is pretty bad. I make it home from work with about 15% But that is a gamble you will always take with a used phone. I blame Google for not making the battery interchangeable. The top panel on the back of the phone I got doesn't sit flush, as if someone tried to pry it off at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Justice corona

customer_reviews.title: Phone stopped won't turn on
customer_reviews.text: I have had the phone for a year and it was working great. Now 1 year and 1 day later it won't turn on. I can't get the seller to help because it is one day after the warranty, taking 2 day shipping into account i haven't had the phone for a year. If I am going to pay for a pricey phone it had better last more than a year. booooooooooo!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Marett

customer_reviews.title: Wrong language
customer_reviews.text: The model I received was progammed in German as well as the manual and the charging block. It did not have the sim ejector tool either. I was very disappointed. I've returned it, and decided to buy it directly from the Google website.
customer_reviews.author: ricjoytam

customer_reviews.title: Camera is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I live in Trinidad and Tobago so I had this phone shipped to NY to my relative who brought it on Christmas day. I activated it yesterday and so far it's been great. I charged it full about 9 pm yesterday but have been playing around with it till about midnight. Battery was on 5% about 11 am today and fully charged it. I'm bought a USB C charger here since my relative forgot the one I got with this phone in NY.
customer_reviews.author: NirElla

customer_reviews.title: Powerhouse phone, tiny battery
customer_reviews.text: The product came as advertised. Was in good refurbished condition,with only the slight scratches on the screen. I personally am disappointed in the phone but that's my fault for not doing enough research before hand. The phone works great....but the battery is the worst I've ever had. I drain it from 100 to 0 four times a day. Luckily it charges fast but that's pretty redic. I understand that you have to make hand off some where with this smooth processers and bitchen camera,but it's a small 5.5 inch phone and the battery is much too small for a device this powerful.
customer_reviews.author: KourtneyKaos

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this phone
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I had expected and then some! I absolutely love this phone! I still haven't gotten through every feature yet so it's like a surprise everyday!
customer_reviews.author: lili Escoto

customer_reviews.title: Phone died, support was useless
customer_reviews.text: This was the best phone I've ever owned, when it worked. Cellular network connection ceased overnight with an update. After contacting support, I was informed that I need a purchase receipt from Google before they would do anything. I haven't even been able to pay for service at this point, and forced to buy a different phone. My new phone is nowhere near as nice to use, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Would give it 5 if not that charger
customer_reviews.text: The phone came well packaged and itself in decent condition. The battery doesn’t last very long but it is expectable if you are buying a used phone. The only thing that disappointed me was the crappiest possible charger that came with the phone. I was not surprised to find out that it was aso dead. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Nikolai

customer_reviews.title: NOT US PHONE - WARRANTY WILL BE VOID
customer_reviews.text: ** Product is listed incorrectly! ** Do not purchase "New" phone from this seller. It comes with a UK charger and manual for European countries. Be weary of purchasing and just buying a replacement charger -- my research tells me that google will not accept the warranty in that case!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Charpin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Might as well be brand new, but at 50% of the cost. I will never buy a new phone again. TheGizmoTrader is my new phone source for life. Every device they sell is pictured in the item's photos, so you know exactly what you're getting. A couple of small scratches, to be expected thanks to the photos and the fact that it's half of what you'd pay new, and otherwise a perfect phone. Every feature works just like new, including gyro, cameras, fingerprint sensor, touch screen, speakers, etc. Can't recommend refurbished from TheGizmoTrader highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Gryffin

customer_reviews.title: Phone deactivates
customer_reviews.text: Phone deactivates problem with charger or battery less than one year old. SELLER WILL NOT STAND BY NEITHER WILL GOOGLE - PROBLEM IS ALL OVER THE INTERNET . NUMEROUS PEOPLE EXPERIENCING THE SAME
customer_reviews.author: Farmuel

customer_reviews.title: This review is directed to this particular seller.
customer_reviews.text: The phone that this seller sold to me worked fine for about 5 months but then I noticed something a little bit odd While making a video call. this very phone that I had just bought ejected something that looked a lot like battery acid out of the side of the microphone grill! Was it sabotaged—-probably): Was I mad—-yes! Would i recommend buying this product—-absolutely not!!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Reiner

customer_reviews.title: This phone is a beautiful Steal
customer_reviews.text: I love that I was able to switch over to Android for $99 bucks. Yes, the phone came with a minor hardly noticeable knick. It's renewed/refurbished, so that's expected. That didn't take away from the fact that this phone is in perfect condition, fast-charging, and super responsive. I wish I had switched to Android sooner..
customer_reviews.author: maya

customer_reviews.title: Not an original device
customer_reviews.text: This device never worked after delivery, we were not able to get a refund or a replacement as well as we exceeded 15 days period. Please dont but any devices from this dealer. When we reached out to the google support, they mentioned that the mother board was damaged and they said the device screen is not original.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bang for buck. Battery life DOUBLE/TRIPLE the pixel 1. Amazing camera.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life amazing! Double or triple what the pixel 1 had. Back camera quality gets compliments every time, & really great features like portrait mode & night mode. Love the integration of hardware and software that comes with the Google phones. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zarina

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Phone works great. Only issue is there is something rattling around inside so that tells me they changed the screen and didn't do a good job
customer_reviews.author: james hudson

customer_reviews.title: Minor scratches? Where?
customer_reviews.text: The description said it had minor scuffs/scratches. The phone arrived in perfect condition, looks and works like new. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but it did not came with charger ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but it did not came with charger as the description said and I have had trouble finding one that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fast phone and easy setup. Very intuitive and easy to use. So glad I switched from a Samsung!! Already have Pi installed and there were no install errors or slow down of apps after install.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G.

customer_reviews.title: As described, just dustier.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped with zero packing materials, just bouncing around in the box. Also came with dirt and dust in the speakers and charging port. So far I don't have any issue with the phone, but more care could have been taking from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Customer
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, thin. I like it very much. The phone is in good condition, like new. Thanks to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Roland

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for a good phone
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone for a good price it had one little scratch on the screen but nothing major the battery seems to run down quicker than I would like but overall it's a good deal
customer_reviews.author: JCobra187

customer_reviews.title: Mines turned out good
customer_reviews.text: Don't be a sheep and over-spend on a cellphone or even worst buy one on credit. This phone performs very well and holds it's weight against the newer models of Android and iPhones. Capitolize on this hidden gem. Save money and judge all your sheepish peers who mortgaged a cell phone😂
customer_reviews.author: Jahkur

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth any penny!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the price your paying... I don't have any dislikes really... So far.. I've had it a month or so no problems switching over to my plan,..
customer_reviews.author: Nicholep24

customer_reviews.title: If there ever was a perfect...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is to good for it's own self. There are so many option in allowing it to run your life. Very intuitive. Just the right size for my hands.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Guest

customer_reviews.title: The phone is good
customer_reviews.text: The phone is good, but the charger that comes with it is a bit finicky.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Ward

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with adaptors
customer_reviews.text: This did not come with any of the adaptors promised, just the cord and charger. I'm having lots of issues switching from my iPhone but internet has lots of tutorials. Overall it seems to be a great phone. Image color can be a tad off and battery only lasts 7-8 hours but it regulates well. Nothing seems to drain it rapidly
customer_reviews.author: kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Just like new
customer_reviews.text: Phone arrived quickly, and was in great shape...just like new! I really like this phone, and the price was really good. It's fast, and doesn't come with all the bloatware like major carrier phones come with that you can't delete. I just wish I had bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal For An Amazing Phone
customer_reviews.text: Incredible deal for such an amazing phone. I would definitely buy this again. The phone works perfectly. My only complaint is that it doesn't come with a USB-C to 3.5 mm adapter. Those are pretty cheap, though. I'm extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kavon

customer_reviews.title: battery really bad
customer_reviews.text: I am excited to get the phone because I am a google phone fan (I had Nexus 3 and 5). However I was disappointed when I set up everything and the battery drained really fast along with restarting now an then. I believe the pixle 2 series is nice but the very product I just got was unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Zihao

customer_reviews.title: Super excited but back is super scratched up
customer_reviews.text: I am super excited about this phone since I have only ever had bad phones. The only disappointing thing is that the back of the phone is like super scratched up and stuff. You may not be able to tell from the photos (I tried to make it so you could see) and I do not know how to get the scratches out. Just a heads up.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Overall very good
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the phone one tiny scratch on the screen and the battery seems to die maybe 1-2 hours faster than I'd like it to but other than thoses two things I cannot think of any more negatives I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Michael Seeley

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone came with a little scratch on the side but besides that it was absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.author: kalena Weimer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item was shipped
customer_reviews.text: We received an SM-J500F instead of an SM-J500H Galaxy J5 Phone unlocked
customer_reviews.author: DIANA ZARKESHFARD

customer_reviews.title: Stoped working after a month
customer_reviews.text: Calls disconnect after a minute, the whole right side of the screen stopped working. It's been 39 days since I got the phone so the seller won't take it back. Don't do my mistake, stay away from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Florsheim

customer_reviews.title: Google phone 👏👏
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved his new phone.. even though is a used one.. is working efficiently and we are glad it doesn't take hours to get charged. I recommend everyone to buy a pixel 2!
customer_reviews.author: Nis

customer_reviews.title: Phone is junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: Battery died in less than a year. These phones are junk!! DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: Bueno
customer_reviews.text: Good phone so far for the price even though I am not a fan of Verizon
customer_reviews.author: The Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect phone best seller
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this seller is the best you can find out there i recieved my phone. Way before the date it had to arrive excellent shipping and packaging. The phone works perfect so far no issues
customer_reviews.author: Jeanif Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life Bad and Crashing
customer_reviews.text: Phone battery drains quickly and camera app crashes all the time rendering it unusable. Phone crashing during standard call too. Outside of return window so out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Phone came quickly and worked well.. I decided to buy a phone instead of going through Asurion. Glad I did .
customer_reviews.author: Keebie J

customer_reviews.title: I have nothing bad to say
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with my purchase. Reasonable price , like new, and have had no problems at all
customer_reviews.author: Audra Collier

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, just as good as iPhones, it comes down to personal preference. I got over the iPhone craze and I'm glad I made the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Syan

customer_reviews.title: Everthing is fine but taking video
customer_reviews.text: Everthing is fine but taking video as it stops taking video after 1 second. I have no ideas about that. And, the slow response to the square button(right bottom) is quite annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Lee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't support regulat headphones
customer_reviews.text: Don't believe the adds it doesn't work with headphones with a 3.5 jack,not even with the included adapter
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for a budget
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as described and a day early! I am extremely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Smart Phone EVER
customer_reviews.text: Loved the Pixel2 so much that when I had it stolen I immediately bought another
customer_reviews.author: Sue Morris

customer_reviews.title: Nice acquisition
customer_reviews.text: Good product, arrived earlyer than expected, the acquisition went very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Dragos Sbarlea

customer_reviews.title: in excellent conditions (NEW)
customer_reviews.text: The product arrive as expected, in excellent conditions (NEW). Just in time to enjoyed the best from Google. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: YYS

customer_reviews.title: but it has a better form factor
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as feature-filled as the Moto Z it replaced, but it has a better form factor, better camera, and most importantly, a better battery life despite my Moto Z having a huge heavy 2rd battery mod.
customer_reviews.author: Zum Zamim

customer_reviews.title: So far the phone works but I did not receive ...
customer_reviews.text: So far the phone works but I did not receive anything other than the phone and a 3rd party charger. What's the reason for this?
customer_reviews.author: Chad Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the jack adapter or the quick start adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Mari M.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I made the switch from Apple to Google!!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone!! I finally decided to ditch Apple, and was torn between the Samsung Galaxy and the Pixel. After reading about how fragile the Samsung screens are, I decided on the Pixel. The phone is not as user friendly as the iPhone, but once you get it set up to your liking, it's amazing. The camera is terrific. And it charges extremely quickly. I've never had a phone that lasted all day (and evening!) on a single charge. I'll never go back to Apple!
customer_reviews.author: MarinCounty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Phone
customer_reviews.text: Having heard all the hype about the pixel 2's camera, decided to take a chance on this "reconditioned" model at a fantastic price. Except for the generic packaging, there is no way this phone is reconditioned. It did not have a mark on the case or screen and the software is straight android with no Verizon or ATT bloat ware. All the features work as advertised. What is there not to like?
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: $600 and does not even support qi charging
customer_reviews.text: I guess it is my fault for thinking that it would and could have normal things most phones it its price range do. But stupid me for not looking into ALL of the specs. I can handle the no sim card expansion for memory or the no phone jack and needing a USB adapter. But now it doesn't even charge wirelessly.... This phone is worth $250 usd. If you pay more for it, you're a fool like me
customer_reviews.author: chris allen

customer_reviews.title: Who needs the latest phone?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone primarily because I needed a phone that worked with android auto, and when I did a search on 'best phones for android auto,' the Google Pixel phones came up consistently. I didn't need the latest and greatest, and thought this was a great value at around $120 (bought in 'very good' condition). It does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: W. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Functionality is flawless
customer_reviews.text: Perfect condition and great deal. Just over $200 is a bargain, especially discovering there is not a great difference in the Pixel 2 and 3. Been using and love the features and functionality. I had 2 Samsung that broke after (first - a year second - year and a half) and a NEW MOTO Z version where the screen went out in the first week. Fingers crossed on the long-term use with this Pixel 2 but very happy so far and not a huge risk with Amazon's return policy and the great value of the phone::))))
customer_reviews.author: Bradford Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product - exceeded it's description
customer_reviews.text: I just have to say - this product arrived ahead if schedule, well-packaged, and in mint condition. A little sticker was affixed to the back that said refurbished by Asurion. I already own a Pixel 3XL so I was very familiar with Androids and Google phones. I would absolutely buy from this seller again. The 'very good' description was an understatement. It looked excellent - no scratches, no dings, flawless activation on my Google Fi account, etc. Now just waiting in a case and screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: M.C.

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT.
customer_reviews.text: Phone works great! Except for a couple TINY surface scratches on the upper left corner of the screen, it was in stellar condition. Works like new, the camera is phenomenal, it’s super fast, and isn’t bogged down by a bunch of apps being open. The battery life could be better, but it is refurbished so I didn’t expect it to operate just like a brand new device and the battery is still pretty reasonable. Normally get through about five hours of HEAVY use (Facebook surfing, playing games, watching YouTube videos, etc) before it gets low (30%ish) and should be plugged in. Definitely a great value for the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Shania

customer_reviews.title: Phone Failed August 16th, 2019
customer_reviews.text: Phone quit working 8/16/2019 after 6 mos. Goggle support tried to help, but ultimately couldn't do anything. Said it needed to be replaced, but it was up to Amazon to do it. Amazon didn't honor the warranty after May, 2019, even tho it was for a year. There's competition here between Google and Amazon and I am the loser. Really, really don't recommend buying a Google phone thru Amazon, or a Pixel at all as they have software and hardware issues.
customer_reviews.author: ASH

customer_reviews.title: It's GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone Used-Very Good and was not disappointed at all!! Hardly any signs of use! The charger that was included kinda sucked but a small setback in the grand scheme. The fingerprint reader on this phone is amazing and quick. The screen is smaller than most smart phones these days but I'm not bothered at all. Still perfectly suited to watch YouTube and Netflix on.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone.
customer_reviews.text: The phone is exactly as described. It works great. I do not use the fingerprint feature on it so I can't speak to that. I am slowly learning about what all of the features can really do (camera, assistant) and probably won't use it to it's full potential but it works perfectly for what I do use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: This phone is a welcome upgrade over my last one which was several years old. The screen is very nice, the whole phone seems quite well made. The battery is above average from my experience, but not spectacular. Well worth the cost when "worse" phones sell for more money.
customer_reviews.author: S. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Battery broken.
customer_reviews.text: The battery is very poor quality. This is an older model, and I think sitting on the shelf must have damaged the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Washingtonian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I had the first Pixel phone and loved it, so when it was time for an upgrade, it only made sense to get the 2. I love the newer features and smoothness of this phone. By far the best Android I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was worried about not getting the XL but this screen is so good it makes up for the small size
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this phone just works. Get a real PD USB C charger and it will charge in no time at all. Amazing deal at $181
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Cracked screen - Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The screen had a sizable scrape in it. Would have like to know that ahead of time. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: viscro

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone, don't care that it's a pixel 2, I love this phone, battery life is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: Best UX ever. Period.
customer_reviews.text: I've been an Android user and early adopter of Google phones for years. This is definitely the best! Great design, comfortable to the hand and intuitive. Sure, the no-3.5-jack is worth mentioning. But I believe it is more disruptive and up with XXI century's style.
customer_reviews.author: Matias Dumrauf

customer_reviews.title: Needless to say I wasn't happy with the device in that condition
customer_reviews.text: No this didn't, I purchased a new in box product, the one I received was used. Needless to say I wasn't happy with the device in that condition.
customer_reviews.author: William Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great phone bought for my son he is very happy ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone bought for my son he is very happy with the phone. A slight misunderstanding with the delivery but, highly recommend seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Charger is only 5 inches long
customer_reviews.text: The charger sent to me is not the factory charger, the USB and the port that plugs into the wall are completely different. It's 5 inches long and of course it's one of those new ones so I don't have another charger that I can use. I literally cannot use this phone while it's plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Gaylord

customer_reviews.title: This is shipped from Germany.  Instructions are in German and the supplied wall plug is European
customer_reviews.text: It's a great phone. My only problem is that buying this from Amazon UK, I expected to receive a UK handset. This was shipped from Germany, took 2 weeks to arrive (missed my Christmas Day deadline) and the instruction manual is all in German. The plug socket is also a European 2 pin type. Not to take away from the quality of the phone though
customer_reviews.author: Barry T.

customer_reviews.title: Make of it what you will
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like this phone.. the pixels are always my first go-to for a clean Google experience.. but with Android 10 getting so locked down, bloated, and clunky, together with Pixel hardware being average with ever more demanding stock Android, OEMs getting faster with OTA updates, and similar stock bootloaders now, I'm wondering whether OEM options are better now
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't too sure about ordering a phone through Amazon but it came as new in the box with all the attachments. My only qualm is now I've had it for about 6 months there seems to be a problem with the camera. It occasionally has difficulty running the application. Not sure whether this is because I dropped it or it needs updating. Still, I am very happy with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ghost Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good mobile phone
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a Sony Xperia with this pixel 2. I found that the wifi worked well, the Bluetooth was adequate, texting was as easy but the phone, I thought, was an improvement in sound quality. System updates are delivered regularly which is nice, Sony seemed to consider that security updates were an optional extra. It runs faster than the Sony ( la2 model ). I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S

customer_reviews.title: Microphone faulty
customer_reviews.text: Great phone but microphone dud, so turned out to be a tiny tablet. Returning for refund. Seller didn't respond to tech question.
customer_reviews.author: John Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone wanting a flagship 2017 phone
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly fast phone. Would recommend to anyone wanting a flagship 2017 phone. The camera has been voted the best of all smartphones this year.!
customer_reviews.author: Harry Baker

customer_reviews.title: Absurd.
customer_reviews.text: It's alright. Although I find it staggering that Google maps doesn't work properly due to some annoying bug where you can't stop it vibrating if it's in your pocket and you're walking. There's no way to turn it off. Google's own software doesn't work on it's own hardware. So I use citymapper instead. Stupid doesn't come close to describing it
customer_reviews.author: Git of a guy

customer_reviews.title: Good but be careful
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, as soon as I completed the update to Android 9. The speakers are screeching though.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: dont buy
customer_reviews.text: i brought this over a year ago and my headhone adapter keeps breaking or something in the phone stops it from working. Getting in touch with google is a complete pain. I'm not even sure if they put you on with people or robots. third or fourth time that in a year. I can't listen to music because of this and I have to keep going through all their hoops to make sure they know the problem as they have no store. They now ask me to pay for a faulty phone. the headphone adapter works for months fine and then breaks. do not buy. save yourself the hastle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Built in obsolescence sucks
customer_reviews.text: For the love of God, do not buy Google hardware unless you plan on changing devices very regularly. Theses thing have a THREE year built in obsolescence- after that you've got a paperweight. Once everyone realises what Google are pulling these will be worth nothing second hand, so don't be suckered in by what may seem like a really good purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have had this phone for a year now and and I have to say that the battery is awful!!!! It doesn't last me 2 hours if you need a decent phone to use for 2 hours a day sure get it but otherwise there are far better options
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: If you live in the UK you can buy from a shop (clue it’s a vehicle + a large storage building) for £529 for 64gb version + you get a google home mini. It’s a great phone, changed from an iPhone although iOS works well the latest android is definitely a match. If your into photos the camera on the pixel is the best on any smartphone including the rip off priced iPhone X.
customer_reviews.author: @BarryMeps

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, poorly executed
customer_reviews.text: I had this phone for 6 months - or rather I had two phones for 3 months before failure. The phone works well, naked Android is great. The camera is great but has failed on both the original and replacement handsets. What is worse is the truly awful service that Google Support give. Google Unsupport would be a much more fitting name. The market has moved on, there are better phones out there for the money and I certainly won't be wasting my time with a Pixel 3. My advice is to consider other options.
customer_reviews.author: Lighty

product_meta.title: Google Pixel 2 64GB 5" 12MP SIM-Free Smartphone in Just Black
product_meta.description: The all-new Pixel 2. Google inside and out. Discover a better way to capture, store and see the world. Pixel 2 features a smart camera that takes beautiful photos even in low light, a fast-charging battery and the Google Assistant built-in. A more impressive camera. All-around. Capture stunning photos with an effortless photography experience. Pixel 2 changes the way you take, save and share your moments – including new ways to dress up your photos with AR stickers. Your photos, forever. Save all your photos and videos in original quality with unlimited storage in Google Photos. This means you’ll never have to delete photos again. Plus Google Photos makes it easy to find, organize and share whatever you want.
feature_bullets: 5.0" inch, AMOLED capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors, 1080 x 1920 pixels, Corning Gorilla Glass 5
64GB Storage, 4 GB LPDDR4x RAM, Cameras (Rear: 12.2 MP / Front: 8 MP), Nano-SIM
2700 mAh battery, Up to 7 hours of go with 15 minutes of charge, Qualcomm Snapdragon 835, 2.35 Ghz + 1.9 Ghz, 64 Bit Octa-Core
What's in the box : Google Pixel 2 Smartphone, USB-C 18W charging plug, USB-C to USB-C cable, USB-C to 3.5 mm headphone adaptor, Quick Switch Adaptor, Quick Start Guide
